Package com.esri.mo2.file.shp

Support for accessing ESRI shapefiles.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MultiPartShape This class declares the methods that are common to all multipart Shapes.
MultiPartShapeM This class declares the methods that are common to all multipart Shapes with Measures.
MultiPartShapeZ This class declares the methods that are common to all multipart shapes with Z values.
Shape This class declares the methods that are common to all non-multipart shapes.
ShapefileIndex This interface establishes the methods that should be supported by all spatial indexes used with shapefiles.
ShapeM This class declares the methods that are common to all non-multipart shapes with Measures.
ShapeZ This class declares the methods that are common to all non-multipart shapes with Z values.
 

Class Summary
DbaseCursor this class implements a Cursor that contains DbaseRecords
DBaseFileHandler This implementation of FileHandler provides support for DBase file datasets.
DbaseRow this class contains the contents of a row from a DbaseTable.
DbaseTable this class provides an Table based api for dBASE files.
DbfCharacterField Mananges dBase Character fields.
DbfDateField Manages dBASE Date fields.
DbfField This class is the superclass for all dBASE fields.
DbfFile This class manages dBase files.
DbfHeader This class holds values from the header of a DBF file.
DbfLogicalField This class mananges dBASE Logical fields.
DbfMemoField This class mananges dBASE Memo fields.
DbfNullValue This class serves as a placeholder object to indicate that a null field value has been read from the file.
DbfNumericField This class mananges dBASE Numeric fields.
DbfRecord This class holds the record data for a dbf file.
DbfWorkspace Deprecated. - the class has been deprecated, see Content API.
MultiPatchShp This class processes MultiPatch shapes
MultiPointMShp This class handles MultiPointM shapes
MultiPointShp This class handles MultiPoint shapes
MultiPointZShp This class handles MultiPointZ shapes
PointMShp This class handles PointM shapes
PointShp This class handles Point shape files
PointZShp This class handles PointZ shapes
PolygonMShp This class processes PolygonM shapes
PolygonShp This class processes Polygon shapes
PolygonZShp This class processes PolygonZ shapes
PolylineMShp This class processes PolylineM shapes
PolylineShp This class processes Polyline shapes
PolylineZShp This class processes PolylineZ shapes
SbnFile Manages a spatial index file.
Shapefile This class manages Shapefiles.
ShapefileCursor this class manages a cursor that contains shapefile features.
ShapefileDataset a Shapefile is a GeoDataset containing ESRI standard format shape data
ShapefileFeature manages a shapefile feature.
ShapefileFeatureClass This class defines the FeatureClass that will manage Shapefiles.
ShapefileFolder Deprecated. - the interface has been deprecated, see Content API.
ShapefileHandler This implementation of FileHandler provides support for ESRI shapefile datasets.
ShapefileManualIndex This class is used when no spatial index exists.
ShapefileMemoryIndex This class acts as a wrapper around an in-memory spatial index.
ShapefileRecord This class holds the contents of both the shp and dbf records.
ShapefileSbnIndex This class acts as a wrapper around an *.SBN spatial index that is associated with a shapefile.
ShapefileSelectionSetCursor this class manages a cursor that contains shapefile features.
ShapefileWriter This class is used by MapObjects to create a shapefile.
ShapeTypes This class defines all of the possible shapefile types.
ShpFile This class manages the geometry component of a shapefile.
ShpGeometry This is the superclass for all shapefile geometry.
ShpRecord This class holds the contents of one shapefile record
VFile This class is a partial implementation of the VFILE subsystem originally used to create the Shapefile (*.shp) and Spatial Index (*.sbn) file systems.
VFileRandomRecord This class holds the record data for all randomly accessed vfiles.
VFileRecord This class holds the contents of a VFILE record.
VFileSequentialRecord this class holds the record data for all sequentially accessed vfiles.
 

Exception Summary
DbfCodePageException Thrown when there is a problem with the encoding or decoding of string values using the current codepage.
DbfDuplicateFieldException This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to add a duplicate field name.
DbfException This is the superclass of all dbf related exceptions.
DbfFieldNameException This exception is thrown when a field has been defined with an invalid name.
DbfFieldPrecisionException This exception is thrown when a field has been defined with an incorrect precision.
DbfFieldTypeException This exception is thrown when an unexpected field type is encountered.
DbfFieldValueException This exception is thrown when a field's value overflows its width.
DbfFieldWidthException This exception is thrown when a field has been defined with an incorrect width.
DuplicateFieldsException This Exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class when two or more Fields have the same name.
GeneralDbfException This exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class whenever it is not possible to throw a more specific DBF exception.
InvalidFeatureTypeException This Exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class when it encounters a shapefile that it does not currently support.
InvalidFieldNameException This exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class whenever a field name is too long.
InvalidFieldPrecisionException This exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class whenever a field contains an illegal number of decimal places.
InvalidFieldTypeException This exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class whenever an invalid field type is encountered.
InvalidFieldWidthException This exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class whenever the width of a field exceeds the limit allowed by its type.
InvalidShapeException This exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class whenever it encounters an invalid or null shape.
InvalidShapefileException This exception is thrown by the ShpFile class whenever it encounters a shapefile with an invalid shape type reference in its header.
InvalidShpFileException This exception is thrown when the format of the shapefile is not correct.
InvalidSpatialIndexException This exception is thrown when the format of the Spatial index file is not correct.
InvalidVFileException This exception is thrown when the VFile class encounters a file whose type can not be determined.
ShapefileAlignmentException This exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class whenever the shp and dbf files do not have the same number of records.
ShapefileAttributeException This exception is thrown by the Shapefile class whenever an attempt is made to create or write a record when there are no attribute fields defined in the shapefile.
ShpException This exception is thrown by the ShapefileWriter class whenever an attempt is made to write a feature to an incompatible shapefile type.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.file.shp Description

Support for accessing ESRI shapefiles.
